00087 sbwSignature::sbwSignature(const char *signature)
00088 {
00089         result = parseType(signature);
00090         name = consumeName(signature);
00091         consume("(", signature);
00092         arguments = new SignatureListContents(signature);
00093         consume(")", signature);
00094 }
00095 
00099 sbwSignature::~sbwSignature()
00100 {
00101         delete arguments ;
00102 }
00103 
00111 std::string sbwSignature::consumeName(const char *&signature)
00112 {
00113         consumeSpace(signature);
00114 
00115         std::string result ;
00116 
00117         while (*signature != '\0' && *signature != '{' && *signature != '}' &&
00118                                 *signature != '[' && *signature != ']' &&
00119                                 *signature != '(' && *signature != ')' &&
00120                                 *signature != ',' && *signature != '\t' && *signature != ' ')
00121         {
00122                 result += *signature ;
00123                 signature++ ;
00124         }
00125 
00126         return result ;
00127 }
00128 
00133 void sbwSignature::consumeSpace(const char *&signature)
00134 {
00135         while (*signature == ' ' || *signature == '\t')
00136                 signature++ ;\
00137 }
00138 
00145 void sbwSignature::consume(const char *expected, const char *&signature)
00146 {
00147         if (!compareString(expected, signature))
00148         {
00149                 std::string message("syntax error expecting ") ;
00150 
00151                 message += expected ;
00152                 message += " got ";
00153                 message += signature ;
00154                 throw new SBWSignatureSyntaxException(message);
00155         }
00156 }
00157 
00165 bool sbwSignature::compareString(const char *expected, const char *&signature)
00166 {
00167         consumeSpace(signature);
00168 
00169         int len = strlen(expected);
00170         
00171         if (strncmp(expected, signature, len))
00172                 return false ;
00173 
00174         signature += len;
00175         
00176         return true ;
00177 }
00178 
00186 sbwSignatureType *sbwSignature::parseScalarType(const char *&signature)
00187 {
00188         consumeSpace(signature);
00189 
00190         if (*signature == '{')
00191                 return new sbwSignatureList(signature);
00192         if (compareString("string", signature))
00193                 return new sbwSignatureScalar<char *, StringType>();
00194         else if (compareString("int", signature))
00195                 return new sbwSignatureScalar<Integer, IntegerType>();
00196         else if (compareString("double", signature))
00197                 return new sbwSignatureScalar<Double, DoubleType>();
00198         else if (compareString("boolean", signature))
00199                 return new sbwSignatureBoolean();
00200         else if (compareString("byte", signature))
00201                 return new sbwSignatureByte();
00202         else if (compareString("void", signature))
00203                 return new sbwSignatureVoid();
00204         else
00205         {
00206                 std::string message = "Whilst parsing signature: ";
00207                 
00208                 message += "Expecting start of type (one of: {, string, int, double, boolean, byte or void) instead got ";
00209                 message += signature;
00210                 throw new SBWSignatureSyntaxException(message);
00211         }
00212 }
00213 
00221 sbwSignatureType *sbwSignature::parseType(const char *&signature)
00222 {
00223         sbwSignatureType *scalarType = parseScalarType(signature);
00224         int dimensions = 0 ;
00225 
00226         while (compareString("[]", signature))
00227                 dimensions++;
00228 
00229         if (dimensions == 0)
00230                 return scalarType ;
00231         else
00232                 return new sbwSignatureArray(scalarType, dimensions);
00233 }
00234 
00244 bool sbwSignature::match(const char *completeSignature, const char *partialSignature)
00245 {
00246 
00247         if (strcmp(completeSignature, partialSignature) == 0)
00248                 return true ;
00249 
00250         sbwSignature signature(completeSignature);
00251 
00252         try
00253         {
00254                 sbwSignature otherSignature(partialSignature);
00255 
00256                 return
00257                         signature.getName().compare(otherSignature.getName()) == 0 &&
00258                                 otherSignature.getArguments().match(signature.getArguments());
00259         }
00260         catch (SBWSignatureSyntaxException *)
00261         {
00262                 std::string name = consumeName(partialSignature);
00263 
00264                 if (name.compare(signature.getName()) == 0)
00265                 {       
00266                         if (*partialSignature == '\0')
00267                                 return true ; 
00268                         
00269                         consume("(", partialSignature);
00270                         SignatureListContents *arguments = new SignatureListContents(partialSignature);
00271                         consume(")", partialSignature);
00272 
00273                         bool result = arguments->match(signature.getArguments());
00274 
00275                         delete arguments ;
00276 
00277                         return result ;
00278                 }
00279         }
00280 
00281         return false ;
00282 }
00283 
00290 Integer sbwSignature::match(const std::vector<std::string> &methods, const char *signature)
00291 {
00292         Integer methodId = 0, methodsFound = 0, methodFound = 0;
00293 
00294         while (methodId != (Integer) methods.size())
00295         {
00296                 if (sbwSignature::match(methods[methodId].c_str(), signature))
00297                 {
00298                         methodsFound++ ;
00299                         methodFound = methodId;
00300                 }
00301 
00302                 methodId++ ;
00303         }
00304 
00305         if (methodsFound == 0)
00306                 throw new SBWMethodNotFoundException("method not found");
00307 
00308         if (methodsFound != 1)
00309                 throw new SBWMethodAmbiguousException("more than one method matches the signature given");
00310 
00311         return methodFound ;
00312 }

00339 SBW_API std::vector<SignatureElement> *Signature::getArguments()
00340 {
00341         return p->getArguments().copyVector();
